\

Here are the tools I use for research. 

\

## Productivity

- Project management: [GitHub projects](https://docs.github.com/en/issues/planning-and-tracking-with-projects/learning-about-projects/about-projects) (Trello and Notion could be alternatives)
  - I will write a post entirely about GitHub projects
- Task management: GitHub projects (for project-relevant tasks), [TickTick](https://ticktick.com/?language=en_US) (for personal tasks)
- Note takng: [Notion](https://www.notion.com/) and [Obsidian](https://obsidian.md/)
- Communication: [Discord](https://discord.com/)


## Text Editing

- LaTex: Overleaf
- Slide: Beamer (for research presentations) and [Quarto](https://quarto.org/) (for other presentations)


## PDF Viewers and Editors

- [PDF Expert](https://pdfexpert.com/)
- [GoodNotes](https://www.goodnotes.com/) (for presentations with iPad)
